title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.181 - Living areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.181 - Living areas

State Regulations

Operation of a food service establishment is not to be conducted in any room used as living or sleeping quarters. Food service operations are to be separated from living or sleeping quarters by complete partitioning and solid self-closing doors. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-1.181

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
